website_summaries.verdict: An ultra-hydrating gel that moisturizes skin without clogging pores.
pros: Gel provides plenty of moisture without clogging pores
Applies smoothly and absorbs quickly into skin
The pump dispenser is durable and reliable
A little product goes a long way
cons: Moisturizer does not include any SPF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin & for normal to dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizer is a 10/10 but it arrived with some of the product leaking out the top. I use the Clinique moisturizing GEL in the summer for my face, but when I need even more moisture in the winter time I use the Clinique moisturizing lotion + when my skin is more dry. I have normal to dry skin and my face is very sensitive to certain face lotions. Some face lotions make my eye lids puffy and swell up but I can put this lotion all over my face and around my eye without any problems! By far the best face lotion I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: light and easy on the skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The only product that never breaks me out. It could've been more moisturizing " def. not for super dry skin" but I still love it. I love how it has no scent.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin

customer_reviews.title: new formula????
customer_reviews.text: This has been my goto for YEARS and this just isn't the same somehow! My skin is peeling and I feel like it isn't even moisturizing! What gives?
customer_reviews.author: Keighyla

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer add moisture serge and you got it made for the day
customer_reviews.text: I use this product daily . I also use moisture serge. Great to help keep skin from drying out plus helps tighten up facial skin for firmer look. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Love this moisturizer. Worth the extra money. A little goes a long way and you get a good amount in the bottle, so it will last you awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine Layton

customer_reviews.title: Will never purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this gel formula not at all like the hydrating lotion. Never would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay moisturizer, not super hydrating. I do feel like it kind of clogged my pores or made me break out. I have oily/combo skin and this left my skin feeling dry. I do appreciate that it has no scent to it at all
customer_reviews.author: Cianna Clark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product as a moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Use it for a face moisturizer. Been using this product for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizer without gel
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want get I wanted just moisturizer this stuff dry my skin out I been using moisturizer for years
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn A.

customer_reviews.title: I’ve used it every day for years!
customer_reviews.text: I like this oil free gel and have used it daily for years. It has no scent. It doesn’t cause breakouts
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Nies

customer_reviews.title: Soft clean feel
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I am using this product, so far so good, its gentle and my face feels soft and clean. One thing though, the soap didnt come with the case/tray as displayed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product i stuck with it and it works as
customer_reviews.text: lasts a long long time. been using this for about 7mths and it has smoothed my skin out and it feels extremely soft ...Not oily at all. great product i stuck with it and it works as described
customer_reviews.author: kiki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Clinique since I was 18! I'm 62 now!
customer_reviews.author: Nita Tapley

customer_reviews.title: N
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I am not satisfied with this product, because the box was open and the product is used, since it lacks product.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY

customer_reviews.title: Weird scent
customer_reviews.text: Smelt super weird compared to what it usually smells like when I buy it from Ulta..
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: There was something clearly wrong with this lotion and gave my face a horrible rash
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Ellerbeck

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: The Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturising Gel is very light cream, I like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Dietrich Gray

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic all round
customer_reviews.text: I've always used this moisturizer because I have combination-dry and oily skin (it changes from season to season) and this has always kept my skin appropriately hydrated but it was really expensive in Australia so I went on Amazon to look. It was a bit of a hit and miss system-there was some complaints on other products about packaging, shipping costs and no pump (not as advertised)! To my relief, it was the direct opposite for me. Not only did it come quickly (other products, I can't say the same unfortunately) but it was exactly how it was presented-untampered, functional pump, fantastic on the skin and packaging that was appropriate and protected it well. Would really recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: DR3920

customer_reviews.title: best moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: this product is very light weight and is easily absorbed in the skin. I would recommend this for any type of skin. It does not leave a greasy feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found this
customer_reviews.text: I've always had problems with my skin, and this is just the solution I was looking for. Makes my skin feel silky and moisturized with feeling oily or greasy. Doesn't feel "heavy" which mean it's perfect for spring and summer too. Love this.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin C

customer_reviews.title: Not real Clinique moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the product before and this is definitely not the authentic Clinique moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: nick chelemen

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: It's the Only moisturizer I can use! Great for combination skin.
customer_reviews.author: Katarina

customer_reviews.title: Not a good moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this by mistake. I thought I was ordering the lotion. HUGE mistake! This made my face feel dry and tight. If you want you face to feel soft and moisturized you need the lotion. Unfortunately they look exactly alike.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Pettit

customer_reviews.title: Good and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I like it.It is good and comfort.Because it does not contain the oil,fit my skin well .And it is very fast!
customer_reviews.author: caseywang

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love this Item... used Clinique since I was a teen and now I am in my fifties, great product consistently, and the real deal. So easy to just push a button on amazon and not hassle with the Mall
customer_reviews.author: NancyL

customer_reviews.title: LO MEJOR EN HIDRATANTES
customer_reviews.text: ESTA HIDRATANTE ES MUY BUENA, IDEAL PARA PIELES GRASAS, ME ENCANTO,REALMENTE ES UN PRODUCTO DE CALIDAD, MI PIEL ES MUY ALERGICA NO PUEDO USAR CUALQUIER PRODUCTO Y ESTE ME CAYO EXCELENTE....MUCHAS GRACIAS
customer_reviews.author: EDIMAR

customer_reviews.title: MOISTURE
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over 30 years. Everyone always comments about how I can't be "That Old"!! Thanks Clinique for an awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Smooth & silky. I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this gel! It’s smooth and almost silky feeling. Great moisturizer by itself or before using makeup. A little goes a long way so the bottle lasts a good while. I do prefer the gel over the lotion. The gel glides on easy and feels best.
customer_reviews.author: evs

customer_reviews.title: Not That Moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: Starting out it was a good moisturizer I was using it for like 3-4 months somewhere down the line it started irritating my skin. I was using it with the Clinique soap Combination/Oily. But this is not that moisturizing to be honest if you like a full on moisturizer this isn’t for you but sometimes my skin gets dry so this didn’t give me enough coverage. But it does go good under make-up.
customer_reviews.author: Rho

customer_reviews.title: Something not right
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase this from a large department store and due to the Corona Virus, i chose to order on Amazon, the contents in the bottle does not smell or feel the same. Something is wrong with the content.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Benigno

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: It seems not that oily as the butter. Feel moisture after using it on hands. I hope so much that Clinique can offer travel size of 100ml or less, bottle with pump, because 125ml bottle cannot be carried on board an airplane; leaking happens to the tube (I experienced this many times when taking it by flight, or driving, air pressure or temperature changes... Nothing about Clinique but "tube" design)
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: This is gel, not lotion, and is for oilier skin.
customer_reviews.text: I should have looked at this product more closely before ordering. I meant to order the lotion and this is the gel. Not right for my skin type. I have been using clinique moisturizer for many years and did not realize I was buying the wrong thing. I am hoping my husband will use it because I am too lazy to return it.
customer_reviews.author: SarahPsych

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer I've ever tried!
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is amazing!!! I much prefer the gel to the lotion. I find my combination skin is never dry and very seldom oily. It's also very gentle as are all Clinique products. For me it's a 5/5!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Burns

customer_reviews.title: I’ll purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Really nice moisturizer, not greasy but good for dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Dellinger

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light moisturizer it's good if you have an oily skin. Fast absorbed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturising Gel
customer_reviews.text: Great price on this product. I've used it daily for years.
customer_reviews.author: mreda

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing Gel
customer_reviews.text: Light on the skin yet provides all day moisturizing effect. My skin loves this product and I love the "no odor" that it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Plinkster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect when used with jojoba oil
customer_reviews.text: I use it along with the acne.org jojoba oil as my moisturizer. It is great since it doesn't break me out no more! I don't use it alone, always use the jojoba oil.
customer_reviews.author: Juhan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite face moristurizers. It did not affect my acne prone skin .
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Top Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this gel. Tops on her Christmas list.
customer_reviews.author: Frank G.

customer_reviews.title: Clinique moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this clinique product for almost 30 years and I never use anything else. I use it under make-up..love it.. my sister got me to use this and she always uses it too!! Daughter-in laws and granddaughter uses this too..
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ernatt

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is much more than I expected! I really loved it. I recommend to all who have extremely oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tainah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best product I have ever used; I prefer the gel over the lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Shiloh

customer_reviews.title: Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturising Gel with Pump
customer_reviews.text: MY sister-in-law was so excited when she received this item. The price was good. The delivery time was even better. All in all, a very good sale!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn G. Knorr

customer_reviews.title: The gel
customer_reviews.text: it was that i expected. I was expected a gel to my tipe of skin, it was ok! thank you
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: This was NOT Clinique's Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this moisturizer for over a decade, thus I know how it smells, feels, etc. The product inside the bottle smells like a combination of diaper rash medicine and baby lotion. I LOVE Amazon, but would avoid the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Booksmart

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: Love Clinique and ordered it for my daughter who is a fan too Have used Clinique for years and love all their skin products
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

product_meta.title: Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturising Gel with Pump 4.2oz / 125ml
product_meta.description: Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel. An essential daily lightweight moisturizing oi-free gel to soften, smooth, and improve the texture and condition of your skin.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
